channel.title: Comments on: [The Witcher 3] [Screenshot] I made my favourite game of all time the 100th Platinum trophy. It was a wild ride from start to finish.

item.title: By: PrinceDizzy
item.dc:creator: PrinceDizzy
item.description: Nice work, congrats on the plat.

item.title: By: Changed-
item.dc:creator: Changed-
item.description: Congrats!! The Witcher 3 is my favourite game to platinum
item.content:encoded: Congrats!! The Witcher 3 is my favourite game to platinum

item.title: By: wilydelaine
item.dc:creator: wilydelaine
item.description: 100 platinums! I have 4! Skyrim, Fallout 4, Horizon Zero Dawn and Bloodborne. Thats absolutely crazy! How!?
item.content:encoded: 100 platinums! I have 4! Skyrim, Fallout 4, Horizon Zero Dawn and Bloodborne. Thats absolutely crazy! How!?

item.title: By: Elden-Cringe
item.dc:creator: Elden-Cringe
item.description:
Wow you own the game for both PC and PS4 huh? LOVED Witcher 3, I remember approaching the game with reservations because the hype was excessive but the storytelling and the depth of it's world made me instantly fall in love with it. Still a stunning game.
It's almost unbelievable that this is the same company that made CP 2077.
item.content:encoded:
Wow you own the game for both PC and PS4 huh? LOVED Witcher 3, I remember approaching the game with reservations because the hype was excessive but the storytelling and the depth of it’s world made me instantly fall in love with it. Still a stunning game.

It’s almost unbelievable that this is the same company that made CP 2077.

item.title: By: madrid_357
item.dc:creator: madrid_357
item.description: And I never finished the DLC, lol. Should play this again aka finish the DLC after I finish all my other games.
item.content:encoded: And I never finished the DLC, lol. Should play this again aka finish the DLC after I finish all my other games.

item.title: By: Mooncraft2515
item.dc:creator: Mooncraft2515
item.description: Did you play it on hardest difficulty from the start? How was it?
item.content:encoded: Did you play it on hardest difficulty from the start? How was it?

item.title: By: ZdawgTGF
item.dc:creator: ZdawgTGF
item.description: Missed opportunity to say “Wild trophy Hunt”

item.title: By: hzoi
item.dc:creator: hzoi
item.description:
Well done. I kept fucking up Gwent and just gave up in that aspect.
Speaking of which, is there a paint licker's guide to Gwent out there?
item.content:encoded:
